request.description:
This endpoint is for API login

1. **PARAMETERS:**
    

email : required , email

password : required, string

ip_address: optional, string

---

**2\. RESPONSE:**

otp:  
{  
"user_id": 2,  
"email": "[adil.g3interactive@gmail.com](https://mailto:adil.g3interactive@gmail.com)",  
"isExpired": 1,  
"message": "An otp has been sent to your registered email address"  
}

---

\*companies key is not if super_admin

//condition 1:- logged user have multiple companies

Response will have companies array, take the company details to redirect to the company choose page. - no saperate api given for user's company list

//condition 2:- logged user have single company

Respinse will have single company object, use the details to save company_id on header .

//condition:- If super admin loggin

saperate api given for list registered companies,named company/list

---

**3\. VALIDATIONS:**

Blank submission

{  
"message": "This field is required. (and 1 more error)",  
"errors": {  
"email": \[  
"This field is required."  
\],  
"password": \[  
"This field is required."  
\]  
}  
}

---

**4\. FAILURE:**

{  
"message": "The login credentials are incorrect."  
}

---

**5\. OTHER EXCEPTION:**

{  
"message": "Something went wrong."  
}

This endpoint is for API logout

1. **PARAMETERS:**
    

---

**2\. RESPONSE:**

{  
"status": true,  
"message": "User successfully signed out."  
}

---

**3\. VALIDATIONS:**

---

**4\. FAILURE:**

{  
"message": "Unauthenticated."  
}

---

**5\. OTHER EXCEPTION:**

{  
"status": false,  
"message": "Something went wrong."  
}
